However, recent late nights erm... 'studying' and the recent hot weather meant that you hadn't got enough sleep lately. Within ten minutes you had dozed off, lying on your front in the sun.

In your dream you were a millionaire; you lived in a huge house, had servants to wait on you and wore clothes studded with diamonds. You were some sort of Queen or Empress, and had everything you possibly wanted. Not only were you rich and powerful, you were quite likely the most beautiful and seductive women on the planet. Standing an imposing seven feet tall, you had flawless features, flowing black hair, a prominent chest and stunning curves. You did whatever you wished, went swimming in the huge pool, took a stroll around your estate or watched your 120 inch TV. Things were perfect. But all good things must come to an end.

Your nap over, you began to wake up. It had been around an hour since you fell asleep, and the sun was getting higher in the sky, bathing you in its warmth. The area was still almost empty, and you hadn't been burned, there still being barely a cloud in the sky. But that was where the similarities ended.

Suddenly you could feel the water lapping against your feet. 'The tide can't have come in... I was at least ten metres from the water when I got here...' You thought to yourself. But surely enough you again felt waves coming up to your toes. You lazily looked over your shoulder and saw the sea around your feet. Confused, the penny dropped what you noticed the rocks not far from you.

The tide had indeed come in over the last hour, but only by a few feet. The tide had not come to you; you had gone to the tide. Putting together having your feet suddenly in the water, and the now tiny rocks made you realised you had actually grown in your sleep!

"Oh my God..." were about the only words you could manage as you acquainted yourself with the recent changes. You were at least thirty-five feet tall, around seven times your height earlier this morning. At this height you would have to crawl under power lines and there was no way you'd ever get into any building but a sports stadium. Aside from your height, you had more curves and lying down your rear was now as high as someone standing up! A narrow waist contrasted hugely with your enhanced breasts; lying on your front you could see them spilling out from under you, their sheer size beyond belief. Your towel had grown with you, now about the size of a tennis court, and you still had your bikini on, both parts (especially the top) made many times bigger to accommodate your new stature.

As you refitted your bikini top and lifted yourself up, you felt an immense feeling of power rush through you. Even at 'only' thirty five feet, it felt like you were miles up in the air as you saw the world from your new orientation. 'These people are so small!' you thought, peering down on the world below. 'This is perfect; in that dream I had I was rich and powerful but here I'm invincible! I can do whatever I want!'

To celebrate your near-deity status you went for a swim. Thanks to you the sea was warm and clear and in the depths where most people were swimming the water only came up to your shins. You had to go out a few hundred metres in order to actually swim, and even there you felt like going out further.

After twenty minutes you decided to come back in and have a play around with being titanic. At this point you were around a kilometre out to sea and could still easily tread water against the currents. You started to swim back, but after a few minutes had a nice idea. Treading water and closing your eyes, you began to grow, seven times your original height was obviously not enough.
1552.title: A girl needs her space...

15521.content:
Thirty-five feet may have put you above the height of a four-storey building, but you always were quite an ambitious girl. Around seven hundred metres from the shore you were still having to swim; you had no idea how far off standing up you were. There was only one way to find out...

You were getting the hang of this reality-changing business pretty well by now, and slowly and surely your body grew. To the people on the beach (who could definitely see you) there wasn't really much change to notice, but you could feel your legs lengthening under the waterline, your height growing by the second. Eventually you felt the sand under your toes again: hitting the bottom the water came up to your neck. '56 feet? That's incredible!' your all-knowing conscience now told you. 'To think that this morning I was about as tall as my ankle is now!' you thought, silently thanking the genie several million times.

Strolling nonchalantly up the beach was quite a challenge for a girl that is around the height of an seven-storey building. However the people below didn't seem to notice much - they got out of your way (face it, they had to) but aside from that you received only cursory glances and the odd remark. Stepping carefully over power lines you made your way home. You were still in your bikini but you didn't really mind: you finally had some curves and a huge body to show them off with so you made the most of it. However, when you got home the... impracticalities of the situation became apparent. You could barely fit a finger through your front door, and whilst you didn't need to drive any more, a girl of your size would need monumental amounts of food and water. Living as a giantess with a body like no other would be extremely difficult.

However there was one small factor that worked in your favour. You could just change everything! You could make yourself invulnerable to hunger or age, give yourself a magical solution to all the problems you could face. Within a few minutes you had made yourself completely unaffected by all the problems you could think of: you were completely invincible. And then that dream crept into your mind, the one you'd had on the beach. You began to imagine not only protection, but domination. You could live like you had in that dream - powerful, controlling, rich and beautiful. Why live like a schoolgirl when you could live like a god?..

Firstly, you'd need somewhere to live, preferably somewhere you could actually fit. You began to create in your mind a huge palace - built of marble it needed sixty-five foot high arched ceilings to accommodate this giant girl, in some places built over six floors. On the outside it presented hundreds of windows, arches and sculptures embedded with gold and precious stones. The massive complex was surrounded by castle-like thirty-foot walls and ramparts, the sole entrance being through an enormous gilded gate. These walls were low by your standards, only reaching your navel; but this seemed to amplify your power to those outside with the thought that you could easily demolish these otherwise impregnable walls.

Inside was an extensive maze of huge rooms and hallways. All were high and wide enough to fit you and the palace included over eight hundred rooms. There were reception chambers, living areas, dining halls, a swimming pool one hundred feet deep and the size of a small lake, and your private chambers. All were lavishly decorated and brightly lit, with reinforced floors to take your pounding footsteps. The top floors at the centre of the main building housed your rooms, where everything was provided for the new titaness that you'd become.

You also altered yourself slightly: As a girl you were now leaner and fitter, showing some areas of muscle. Your waist was narrower and your breasts had become firmer and more rounded. Overall you had aged a little to your physical peak of 19, your hair longer and your facial features flawless. You also now seemed to be more mature and sophisticated; you stood up straight and walked more dignified. You were still a young girl at heart, but now you had matured - you were slightly bigger at 60'9", standing well above the local skyline. The crowning glory was your immense bust - which at its fullest measured almost forty feet around: Had you been of any normal stature you would need at least a 28N bra.

Of course, it was impossible to make such a monumental change without having an impact: a few extra cup sizes or a sudden improvement in school grades could be passed off, but here along with the new Nayuki came a new, greater reason for her existence...
15521.title: Living the dream

choices: Go and see how Kyoko has been changed
155211.content:
Tatakashino Nayuki was better known to her subjects as Empress of the Divine Japanese Empire. She was universally renowned as a goddess, presiding over her territory which she had governed for over four decades with strength and an ultimate wisdom. In the aftermath of the war she swept away the previous weak Japanese monarchy and announced herself as a deity, destined to rule and restore Japanese prestige. A physical giant and an imposing beauty, she is eternally young and immensely powerful. During the '40s and '50s her strength and divine will reconstructed the nation stronger than ever, and within ten years she had eradicated crime, political separatism and corruption. Under her, Japanese legions crushed all opposition, her fleets ruling the waves unmatched. By 1980 Manchuria, Tibet, Burma and almost all of south-east Asia was hers: China was but a colony and the Soviet Union was a sworn ally of her government.

Nowadays the Empire was by far the largest industrial and economic force in the world: Japanese factories produced goods for the world market on an immense scale and the nation grew richer. This vast wealth was spent on the people's welfare and services, as well as on ambitious new projects such as the 29-mile Miyabi bridge and, commissioned in the year 2000 - the new Imperial Palace. This building was designed for Empress Nayuki herself and so was built to the massive standards required to accommodate her. When completed it would ultimately surpass China's Imperial Palace and the Forbidden City: Covering 32 square miles and including over 1,300 rooms, this city-sized monolith would be the ultimate centrepiece of the Goddess' power. Whilst it was being built, she would have to settle for the 'small' complex built for her in a different part of the country.

You were woken by the soft feeling of sunlight across your face: it was dawn and the rising sun beamed through the huge windows from the now very different outside world. You knew you were now a titanic spectacle of a woman, many dozens of times bigger than virtually everyone else; yet getting out of bed, stretching your arms and blinking the sleep out of your eyes you felt no real difference.

As your nightwear you wore a huge silk nightdress: spanning from your shoulders down to your hips. It was laced with wired gold and silver, inlaid with hundreds of precious stones throughout. It clung tightly to your voluptuous curves, stretched tight in an effort to contain your huge breasts. Your hair, even after a long night, was perfect and shimmering in the dawn light. Wandering over to the 70-foot windows of your bedroom, you gazed over your new world.

Suddenly the silence was interrupted by the clanking of the main door. Heaved open by six black-garbed Imperial Dragoons, a number of your palace guardsmen, sabres drawn, entered the room, followed by the royal family. You could easily recognise the now Queen Mother and two Princesses, though like you they were not unchanged. Your mother looked very slightly older, but showed the warm, contented expression befitting a wise and caring woman; a national treasure. The princess Matsuri had certainly developed: whilst unable to hold a candle to you, she now stood over nine feet tall, strongly built with long black hair and an immense bust. The younger Misuzu was smaller and more slender though still an incredible beauty. You spent the morning with your family, talking of your new world order and catching up on the latest from across the empire. It must have been the first time in history you and your sisters had had a civilised conversation.

You soon became restless, wanting to go out and see your new world. You wanted to explore and see what was different, to feel that surge of power from looking down on people, buildings and streets below your huge body. Your mind raced through countless possibilities of what to do with your new world; you could take gold, clothes, anything you wanted from the people that now revered and worshipped you. You could go out and see your empire, address your citizens, make things exactly as you see fit. You could create monuments to yourself, raze a city to the ground, there would be no one to stop you.

You left your palace in six-foot high-heels, clad in a white dress, designed to showcase your long legs and stunning figure. Thousands of diamonds made up spiralling patterns across your chest, all converging into one point on each nipple. Your jet black hair was worn down, cascading down your shoulders, held at the back with a large platinum clasp. As the new Goddess Nayuki strolled out the main gate of her palace onto the city's main thoroughfare, the world outside stared up in awe.

As your people once again greeted the thunderous footsteps of their Empress, a contented smile set in across your face. Running your fingers along the glass fronts of buildings, curiously examining your surroundings, you returned the well-wishes and reverence presented by your citizens and wondered what to do next.
155211.title: A new world order

1552112.content:
You decided to see the world outside,where your people lives peacefully after your leadership. As you walked, people around you praised for your goodness and continued their work with passion. No more poverty or hunger. You felt proud with the kind of power in your hand, everything worked like a charm. But there is one that you remembered, your own friend Kyoko. She used to be your friend at school and now the era changed. You wondered if she still on the same school like it used to be. Without doubt, you altered the reality once more. An old city which lies on the coast, the city where Kyoko lives. After altering, you decided to come for a visit.

As you arrived, you saw the city changed a bit than you used to be regarding the same exact year. There were more apartments than houses, several new school and university, others were magnificent park to keep a low air pollution. Your old school eventually now the largest in the city. You decided to have a visit to see how education works now. You converted yourself into a disguise of normal school girl of the school and altering the registry over there. Your temporary name is Yukina Mashiro, you kept your body to look more voluptuous than the average school girl, and came from rich family. You transformed some of your jewelries into a bag and head accessories, your dress turned into school uniform and your heels turned into the most expensive shoe in Japan and over the world. You proceed to come inside.

"Look, the goddess image returned!" said a student, looking at your glamor aura. Nobody noticed that you are their Goddess but disguised or more likely converted to fit inside. You did not mind to keep the praise and let every students saw you. Some of the boys also took a picture and other some would give you presents. "Yukina! We love you!" shout a fanclub of your admiration. You giggled and gave them wink. Things from high school were all unique like you used to be.

Finally you managed to find the classroom where Kyoko currently on. As you came in, you saw a similar figure that you used to remembered. She is still the same Kyoko and now sit beside your desk. Just with a bit different, she seemed to be more quite. "May I sit here?" you came approach her and asked for a seat, Kyoko just nodded. "Wow, you looked quite everyday... Something bothering you?" You tried to figure something about her by altering her mind to talk. "I'm sorry. I just don't feel a bit good today." "Because?" "I have to prepare a ceremony at my family shrine." She explained. You learned the current Kyoko now owns a family shrine. "So, what ceremony do you have to prepare?" "A prayer to thank for Goddess Nayuki blessings." "I see..." The bell rang and the lessons started.

While studying with Kyoko, you learned that the current education in high school is more focused on every subject. Most of them are advanced and some are required for enrolling to universities. Your own history also being taught in high school and your life events were noted with details. Nothing went negative so far, the canteen provides high class of food, the toilets are clean and sparkles, gymnasium had complete set and there were different fields for outdoor sports. It is already the standard that you had decided before.

After school, you asked to go with Kyoko, she seemed surprised. "It's rare to have a friend especially from the higher class family." She explained, you thought she probably not a lucky girl in your era. You waited the time until you revealed your truth to her. When you arrived at her house, you noticed that her shrine was the largest shrine in the city. Her house was behind it, making a traditional Japanese house but with modern facility. You followed Kyoko to her room, "well... If you don't mind." She asked for changing her uniform into her kimono and brought you another set of kimono. "You can wear it and join to the ceremony." She said.

Looking at Kyoko, you couldn't wait any longer to show your true self to her. However you still have plenty of time or alteration to show her the truth later.
1552112.title: Meeting with an old-new friend

choices: "Nayuki...I've been in love with you even before you were a goddess!!"
I can't say...I honestly don't know.
15521121.content:
Kyoko handed you the kimono but you pushed it back shaking your head. "A bit...too simple, isn't it?" You smiled with a grin. Your eyes meeting hers, Kyoko gasped.

"The Goddess would be-" You stop her simply by putting a finger to her lips. With a bright smile you reply.

"Would be what? What would I be Kyoko?" Kyoko froze in shock, you then altered her mind, allowing her to see who you really are, She gasped and took a step back. But more changes came, she saw the 'other life time.' how you two were best friends and how close you were. Then she saw something else, all those years, the two of you had been so close but you had feelings for her, and until the new power you had, you were unable to express them. "So...how did you feel all that time?" You ask holding her tightly allowing Kyoko to freely answer. "Did you love me, be honest...please." You smile keeping her close, altering her mind slightly so that she doesn't feel nervous or obligated to tell the truth she says ________ feeling worried about how you would reply...
15521121.title: Tell Kyoko about yourself now

info.brief_description: A girl obtains reality changing powers... what does she do?
info.description:
People who write good additions to my interactive will STILL get a 1000+ gift point rewarded. This number might increase if I really liked your addition!

This story moderation is not dead! Far from it even!
Infact I even removed much of the rules that were in affect earlier.

You're Nayuki a 16 year old female japanese student.
Standing just 4'9" tall she isn't the tallest in her class.
Her breast ain't big, just barely an B cup.

She is the oldest of the 3 sisters in the family.
The youngest of the sisters is Misuzu, 13 years old, 4'2", A cup
The other sister is Matsuri, 15 years old, 5'5", D cup
Nayuki is jealous because her younger sister is bigger uptop and taller too.

One day she finds a lamp in the attic with a Genie.
The genie grants you your wish to be able to change reality, and the story goes on involving.

-Normal day of life while bigger/getting bigger
-Get her classmates/friends/sisters involved
-Go nuts!

BUT there are some rules...

Goals:
-Focused on good descriptive growth and reality changes. (Yes, NO one-line processes...)
-Characters unknowingly get changed.
-Stay gentle and respectful to the world around you!
-Adding your own idea's, it's encouraged!

Minorly focused:
-Growth, The main focus.
-Growth of body parts, Breasts, legs, hips, go nuts :)

Things that will be deleted:
-One-liners or one paragraphs.

And I'm reserving the right to change the rules to my wishes ofcourse...

Some credits:
-bullderdash, for making a good number of additions. Thanks!
